website_summaries.verdict: Great for making a lot of ice cream without taking up a lot of storage space.
pros: Makes 4 quarts of ice cream in 20-40 minutes
The bucket collapses to make everything easy to store in a small space
Waterproof bucket is easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for a space saver. Works well too.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ice cream maker for about a year now and I love it! It is so much smaller to store than the standard style. Considering that most of us with ice cream makers don't make ice cream more than a few times a year, that's a nice feature! Make sure that you run it inside in the air conditioning though. We tried running it outside on a hot day and the ice cream never did set up. It works so much better inside!
customer_reviews.author: Rhinestone Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Easy to Use! Easy Storage!  Great Ice Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Made a chocolate frozen custard and it was wonderful. Ripened to just the right consistency!
customer_reviews.author: PDN

customer_reviews.title: Easy summer treats😘😘😘
customer_reviews.text: Great ice cream maker! Compact and easy to store. I recommend to everyone🍧🍧🍧
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love it... Best smaller sized ice cream maker out there. The price makes it much better!
customer_reviews.author: IDNAS38

customer_reviews.title: Makes great ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Makes great ice cream. Made the strawberry sorbet recipe in the booklet, it was yummy and not to much sugar!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Collapsable bucket is sturdy. Only con is it is not easy getting it back in box for storage but that could be just me.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mum

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to find this space-saving ice cream maker ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this space-saving ice cream maker, but unfortunately it came with a dent. The rim was bent so if used the ice/salt would have been able to get into the ice cream. I never got the chance to try it, so I don't know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice cream maker!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! Look the function! Love the ease of use and storage!
customer_reviews.author: Reeger North

customer_reviews.title: ICE CREAM
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little ice cream maker and to be honest it is the first that I have owned. So naturally when I got it I had to try it out, it was actually pretty easy to use and put together. Although I did have one batch that came out not so good, but that was because of what I put in it, or lack thereof. I have used it a few times but my lady is much better with it. This product works very well and I have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: fmwaalex

customer_reviews.title: Vintage looks
customer_reviews.text: This item creates much the same type of ice cream product as others on the market. Where it stands out is in visual design - it really has the yesteryear look of vintage makers from the 1960's and 1970's. Would make a great hostess gift during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lewis

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 68990 Easy to Store Ice Cream Maker
product_meta.description: With Hamilton Beach Ice Cream Makers, you can enjoy creating homemade ice cream, frozen yogurt, sherbet and gelato in your own kitchen. Just add your favorite ingredients, sit back and relax-you'll be scooping delicious ice-cold desserts in no time.
feature_bullets: Big on flavor - small on storage space
Unique folding design with waterproof bucket uses 39% less storage space
Makes ice cream; frozen yogurt; custard; sorbet; gelato; and sherbet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
